info.name: Adwaita Tabs for Thunderbird
info.description: This style intends to mimic Gnome 3 tabs as close as it is possible.
info.additionalInfo:
v 1.3 - Updated styles and added styling for close buttons on tabs

For better look, please adjust the following settings using Thunderbird Config Editor:

- mail.tabs.autoHide = true (to hide tab bar with the single tab open);

- mail.tabs.tabMaxWidth to the half of your horizontal monitor resolution (pixels) so that with minimum 2 tabs opened these tabs would be stretched across the whole Thunderbird window.

Also, install the Rise of the Tools extension (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-us/thunderbird/addon/rise-of-the-tools/) that moves toolbar above the tabbar. 

Enjoy!
